wikipedia_page.main:
Shalini Mahtani, MBE, (born April 12, 1972) (Chinese: 馬夏邐) is the founder and former Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Community Business, a non-profit organization dedicated to corporate social responsibility in Asia.In 2014, Mahtani founded The Zubin Foundation, an independent non-profit organization to raise awareness on social issues in Hong Kong.
Mahtani serves on the board of Community Business, Hong Kong Unison and The University of Hong Kong Career Advisory Board. Mahtani is an appointed member of the Hong Kong SAR Government's Transport Advisory Committee and Business Facilitation and Advisory Committee.

response: * Shalini Mahtani. For services to corporate social responsibility in Hong Kong.
